title: Computer Vision Made Easy!
description:
Computer Vision made easy: from pre-trained models to custom ones, Cognitive Services has you covered. Join Kelly Freed, PM on the Azure Cognitive Services team, and learn about the latest technologies in Computer Vision such as analyzing images, extracting insights from your pictures and videos, recognizing common objects, and more.

For all the sessions: https://channel9.msdn.com/Events/Cognitive-Services/Cognitive-Services-Live
